backend.physics
Interface GizmoPhysics

All Superinterfaces:
PiecePhysics
All Known Subinterfaces:
Gizmo, MobileGizmo, MobileGizmoPhysics, RotatableGizmo, RotatableGizmoPhysics, StaticGizmo, StaticGizmoPhysics
All Known Implementing Classes:
Absorber3D, CubicalBumper3D, Flipper3D, OuterWall3D, SphericalBumper3D, TriangularBumperA3D, Wall
public interface GizmoPhysics
extends PiecePhysics

GizmoPhysics - defines all methods that gizmos must implement in order to be succesfully processed by the engine

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar

Method Summary
 void addConnection(GizmoPhysics toBeTriggered)
          Adds a connection between this gizmo and another gizmo The connection always results with any action performed on this gizmo triggering the action on all connected gizmos.

          Triggers actions that occur when a ball colides with this gizmo

addConnection

public void addConnection(GizmoPhysics toBeTriggered)
                   throws GizmoException
Adds a connection between this gizmo and another gizmo The connection always results with any action performed on this gizmo triggering the action on all connected gizmos. this --> toBeTriggered, NOT toBeTriggered --> this

Parameters:
toBeTriggered - - the gizmo to be be triggered
Throws:
GizmoException - - if toBeTriggered already exists

delCollection

public void delCollection(GizmoPhysics toBeTriggered)
                   throws GizmoException
Deletes the connection between this gizmo and another gizmo

Parameters:
toBeTriggered - - gizmo that was to be triggered
Throws:
GizmoException - - if toBeTriggered is not a conncetion

clearConnections

Clears all connections this gizmo has with other gizmos

the reflection coefficient of the gizmo

getConnections

public java.util.Set getConnections()
A set of all gizmos that this gizmo is connected to

read-only set of gizmos that this gizmo is connected to
